g.text: A reference to a loyalty program
The TMForum Loyalty Management API Specification
A person or group that opts in to a loyalty
An instance of a loyalty program
specification, linked to a specified loyalty
An event type used to match filter incoming
A condition, comprised of a attribute that
will be tested against a value.
A partner engaged in the Loyalty Program
A specialised event to process direct loyalty
A specialised event to process direct loyalty
